short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View any webpage in different device dimensions with custom sizing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Responsive Viewer helps developers and designers test webpage responsiveness across multiple device sizes.
Key Features:
• Pre-configured device presets (Desktop, Laptop, Tablet, Mobile, etc.)
• Custom dimension input
• Quick rotation button
• Zoom controls
• Dark/Light theme
• Keyboard shortcuts
• Pixel grid overlay
• Measurement tools
• Smooth animations and transitions
Perfect for:
• Web Developers
• UI/UX Designers
• QA Engineers
• Anyone testing responsive designs
